subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Sue Bird made a tie-breaking jumper from the foul line with 2.6 seconds left, and the Seattle Storm beat the Atlanta Dream in Game 1 of the W.N.B.A. finals.
snippet: Sue Bird made a tie-breaking jumper from the foul line with 2.6 seconds left, and the Seattle Storm beat the Atlanta Dream in Game 1 of the W.N.B.A. finals.
